headline: Has Iron Mountain’s 12.8% Drop in 2025 Created a Rare Opportunity?
summary: Curious if Iron Mountain is genuinely a bargain right now, or if the recent headlines are just noise? Let's cut through the hype and get straight to the facts about its true value. After a stellar few years, Iron Mountain's shares have lost 12.8% year-to-date and are down 17.9% over the last twelve months, despite a massive 343.3% gain across the past five years. Recent attention on Iron Mountain has centered around its continued growth in data center operations and the company's expansion...
